WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,

I am using PHPExcel version 1.7.8.
Issue which i am facing is,

In xls file one cell set as date and value is 1/26/2015.
But while i get the value using PHPExcel then it is converting to 01-26-15.

Here is the code i am using to get the cell value.
$xlsValue = $objWorksheet->getCellByColumnAndRow($col, $row)->getFormattedValue();

__Please Note : when we see the format of the cell in MS Office 2013, it shows format cell as Date. But if i am check the same cell in WPS Office portal, it shows format as Custom.(is issue come because of this Custom format?)__

Can anyone please help me in this situation?

Thanks,
Nik
WorkItem.Summary: Date is changed while get cell value via xlsx file
